faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get insights into the AI Bokeh Generator

items.title: What type of effects can this generator create?
items.description: The AI Bokeh Generator can create various levels of depth and artistic bokeh effects to enhance your images, making them more eye-catching and visually appealing.

items.title: Is it free to use the AI Bokeh Generator?
items.description: Yes! Users receive 30 free credits daily, which allows for numerous enhancements without cost. Additional credits can be earned through various activities.

items.title: Can I use my edited photos commercially?
items.description: Users with a paid subscription can commercially utilize their edited photos. Free-tier users may only use enhanced images for personal projects.

items.title: Is my privacy protected when I use the generator?
items.description: Yes, all processing is done in your browser, meaning your images are never uploaded or stored on any servers for added privacy and security.
